alert.note: Alert for Maverick (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 3:51PM CDT until April 28 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Maverick County in south central Texas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 350 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Darling, or 9 miles northeast of Quemado, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quemado, Radar Base, Normandy, Darling, Paloma, Elm Creek, U.S. Highway 277 and State Highway 131. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
